rooms.description: Open living space with natural lighting and ventilation, aligned east-west per Vastu for positive energy flow.
Spacious bedroom with south-eastern orientation, ensuring harmony with Vastu guidelines.
Secondary bedroom positioned in the north-western area, maintaining balance as per Vastu principles.
Third bedroom in the north-eastern corner to maximize natural light and energy flow.
Functional kitchen space positioned in the south-western zone to adhere to Vastu guidelines.
Dining space adjacent to the kitchen for ease of movement and natural light.
Compact bathroom with proper ventilation, placed near the master bedroom as per Vastu norms.
Study area designed for productivity with adequate natural lighting and Vastu alignment.

openings.description: Main entrance facing east to invite positive energy.
Back door positioned to maintain natural flow according to Vastu.
Garage door for the two-car garage ensuring easy access and eco-friendly material usage.
Energy-efficient windows installed throughout to maximize natural light and ventilation.

garage.description: Dedicated two-car garage built with sustainable materials and aligned according to eco-friendly principles.
